ArticleTitle.sentence: marA locus causes decreased expression of OmpF porin in multiple-antibiotic-resistant (Mar) mutants of Escherichia coli.

event.clue: marA locus causes decreased expression of OmpF porin in multiple-antibiotic-resistant (Mar) mutants of Escherichia coli.
marA locus causes decreased expression of OmpF porin in multiple-antibiotic-resistant (Mar) mutants of Escherichia coli.

AbstractText.sentence: Mar (multiple antibiotic resistant) mutants of Escherichia coli express chromosomally mediated resistance to a variety of structurally unrelated hydrophilic and hydrophobic antibiotics.

event.clue: Mar (multiple antibiotic resistant) mutants of Escherichia coli express chromosomally mediated resistance to a variety of structurally unrelated hydrophilic and hydrophobic antibiotics.

AbstractText.sentence: Insertion of transposon Tn5 into the marA locus at min 34.05 on the chromosome completely reverses the Mar phenotype (A.M. George and S.B. Levy, J Bacteriol 155:531-540, 1983).

event.clue: Insertion of transposon Tn5 into the marA locus at min 34.05 on the chromosome completely reverses the Mar phenotype (A.M. George and S.B. Levy, J Bacteriol 155:531-540, 1983).
Insertion of transposon Tn5 into the marA locus at min 34.05 on the chromosome completely reverses the Mar phenotype (A.M. George and S.B. Levy, J Bacteriol 155:531-540, 1983).

AbstractText.sentence: We found that among changes in the outer membrane of Mar mutants, porin OmpF was greatly reduced, although Mar mutants were more resistant than cells lacking only OmpF.

event.clue: We found that among changes in the outer membrane of Mar mutants, porin OmpF was greatly reduced, although Mar mutants were more resistant than cells lacking only OmpF.

AbstractText.sentence: Transduction of the marA region from a Mar strain, but not a wild-type strain, led to loss of OmpF.

event.clue: Transduction of the marA region from a Mar strain, but not a wild-type strain, led to loss of OmpF.
Transduction of the marA region from a Mar strain, but not a wild-type strain, led to loss of OmpF.

AbstractText.sentence: P1 transduction of marA::Tn5 into a Mar mutant partially restored OmpF levels.

event.clue: P1 transduction of marA::Tn5 into a Mar mutant partially restored OmpF levels.
P1 transduction of marA::Tn5 into a Mar mutant partially restored OmpF levels.

AbstractText.sentence: Therefore, OmpF reduction required a mutation in the marA region.

event.clue: Therefore, OmpF reduction required a mutation in the marA region.
Therefore, OmpF reduction required a mutation in the marA region.

AbstractText.sentence: Mar mutants of an ompF-lacZ operon fusion strain expressed 50 to 75% of the beta-galactosidase activity of the isogenic non-Mar parental strain, while Mar mutants of a protein fusion strain expressed less than 10% of the enzyme activity in the non-Mar strain.

event.clue: Mar mutants of an ompF-lacZ operon fusion strain expressed 50 to 75% of the beta-galactosidase activity of the isogenic non-Mar parental strain, while Mar mutants of a protein fusion strain expressed less than 10% of the enzyme activity in the non-Mar strain.

AbstractText.sentence: These changes were completely reversed by insertion of marA::Tn5.

event.clue: These changes were completely reversed by insertion of marA::Tn5.
These changes were completely reversed by insertion of marA::Tn5.

AbstractText.sentence: The responsiveness of OmpF-LacZ to osmolarity and temperature changes was similar in Mar and wild-type strains.
Although some transcriptional control may have been present, OmpF reduction appeared to occur primarily by a posttranscriptional mechanism.

event.clue: Although some transcriptional control may have been present, OmpF reduction appeared to occur primarily by a posttranscriptional mechanism.
Although some transcriptional control may have been present, OmpF reduction appeared to occur primarily by a posttranscriptional mechanism.

AbstractText.sentence: The steady-state levels of ompF mRNA were twofold lower and the mRNA was five times less stable in the Mar mutant than in the wild-type strain.
Expression of micF, which lowers ompF mRNA levels, was elevated in Mar strains, as revealed by a micF-lacZ fusion.

event.clue: Expression of micF, which lowers ompF mRNA levels, was elevated in Mar strains, as revealed by a micF-lacZ fusion.
Expression of micF, which lowers ompF mRNA levels, was elevated in Mar strains, as revealed by a micF-lacZ fusion.

AbstractText.sentence: Studies with strains deleted for the micF locus showed that the marA-dependent reduction of OmpF required an intact micF locus.

event.clue: Studies with strains deleted for the micF locus showed that the marA-dependent reduction of OmpF required an intact micF locus.
Studies with strains deleted for the micF locus showed that the marA-dependent reduction of OmpF required an intact micF locus.

AbstractText.sentence: Our findings suggest that the marA locus directly or indirectly increases micF expression, causing a posttranscriptional decrease in ompF mRNA and reduced amounts of OmpF.

event.clue: Our findings suggest that the marA locus directly or indirectly increases micF expression, causing a posttranscriptional decrease in ompF mRNA and reduced amounts of OmpF.
